| status = VU status_system = IUCN3.1 name = Sand sharks image =
| Grey_Nurse_Shark_at_Fish_Rock_Cave,_NSW.jpg image_width = 250px image_caption
| = Sand tiger shark (''Carcharias taurus'') fossil_range = regnum = Animalia
| phylum = Chordata classis = Chondrichthyes subclassis = Elasmobranchii ordo =

| Henle, 1839

'Sand sharks', also known as 'sand tiger sharks', 'grey nurse sharks' or
'ragged tooth sharks', are mackerel sharks of the family 'Odontaspididae'. They
are found worldwide in temperate and tropical waters. There are four species in
two genera.
wiki.title: sand shark
